thread.title: Nikkei Up as Fears Ebb About China’s Slower Growth
thread.title_full: Nikkei Up as Fears Ebb About China’s Slower Growth - WSJ

author: Kosaku Narioka
title: Nikkei Up as Fears Ebb About China’s Slower Growth
text: 0151 GMT [Dow Jones] Japanese stocks are up as fears ease that China’s slowdown will hit Japanese corporate earnings results. Steel and machinery sectors lead the market higher as these stocks appear to have factored in much of the potential negative effects from slowdown in China and other economies. Nippon Steel & Sumitomo Metal Corp. (5401.TO) is up 3.2% to Y2,482.0 following a Nikkei report that the company’s pre-tax profits are projected to amount to about Y300 billion for the fiscal year ending March, compared with the Y452 billion pre-tax profits in the previous fiscal year. While that is a big fall, its... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
